name: 8th International Conference on Networks, Mobile Communications And Telematics
content: 8th International Conference on Networks, Mobile Communications And Telematics (NMOCT 2022) is a forum for presenting new advances and research results in the fields of Network, Mobile communications and Telematics. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field.
